post:
[Ellipsis Node](http://ellipsisno.de/) is a VPS brand with offers out of OVH. I'm aiming to have a node in Fiberhub ready for next month and hopefully more locations around the world after that.

The service is 'new' so I would like to give LETers the chance to try a VPS at $1 for 7 days. If you're satisfied, upgrade to a yearly subscription at the end of the week. If not, I'll refund the dollar. (Please note that this thread is not spam).

<pre><a href="http://ellipsisno.de/let/#new">FUNCTION</a>  
2 Cores  
2 TB BW  
22 GB HDD  
222 MB RAM  
222 MB VSwap  
$12.22 / year
